verses.verse: In the beginning <WH7225> God <WH430> created <WH1254> the heavens <WH8064> and <WH853> the earth. <WH776>

Now the earth <WH776> was <WH1961> formless <WH8414> and empty. <WH922> Darkness <WH2822> was on the surface <WH6440> of the deep. <WH8415> God <WH430>'s Spirit <WH7307> was hovering <WH7363> over <WH5921> the surface <WH6440> of the waters. <WH4325>
God <WH430> said, <WH559> "Let there be <WH1961> light, <WH216>" and there was light. <WH216>
God <WH430> saw <WH7200> the light, <WH216> and saw <WH3588> that it was good. <WH2896> God <WH430> divided the light <WH216> from <WH996> the darkness. <WH2822>

God <WH430> called <WH7121> the light <WH216> "day, <WH3117>" and the darkness <WH2822> he called <WH7121> "night. <WH3915>" There was evening <WH6153> and there was morning, <WH1242> one <WH259> day. <WH3117>
God <WH430> said, <WH559> "Let there be an expanse <WH7549> in the middle <WH8432> of the waters, <WH4325> and let it divide <WH914> the waters <WH4325> from the waters. <WH4325>"

God <WH430> made <WH6213> the expanse, <WH7549> and divided <WH914> the waters <WH4325> which <WH834> were under <WH8478> the expanse <WH7549> from the waters <WH4325> which <WH834> were above <WH5921> the expanse; <WH7549> and it was so. <WH3651>
God <WH430> called <WH7121> the expanse <WH7549> "sky. <WH8064>" There was evening <WH6153> and there was morning, <WH1242> a second <WH8145> day. <WH3117>

God <WH430> said, <WH559> "Let the waters <WH4325> under the sky <WH8064> be gathered together <WH6960> to <WH413> one <WH259> place, <WH4725> and let the dry <WH3004> land appear; <WH7200>" and it was so.

God <WH430> called <WH7121> the dry <WH3004> land <WH776> "earth," and the gathering together <WH4723> of the waters <WH4325> he called <WH7121> "seas. <WH3220>" God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good. <WH2896>

God <WH430> said, <WH559> "Let the earth <WH776> yield <WH1876> grass, <WH1877> herbs <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> seed, <WH2233> and fruit <WH6529> trees <WH6086> bearing <WH6213> fruit <WH6529> after their kind, <WH4327> with <WH834> its seed <WH2233> in it, <WH776> on the earth;" and it was so.

The earth <WH776> yielded <WH3318> grass, <WH1877> herbs <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> seed <WH2233> after their kind, <WH4327> and trees <WH6086> bearing <WH6213> fruit, <WH6529> with its seed <WH2233> in it, <WH4327> after their kind; and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good. <WH2896>
There was evening <WH6153> and there was morning, <WH1242> a third <WH7992> day. <WH3117>

God <WH430> said, <WH559> "Let there be lights <WH3974> in the expanse <WH7549> of sky <WH8064> to divide <WH914> the day <WH3117> from the night; <WH3915> and let them be for signs, <WH226> and for seasons, <WH4150> and for days <WH3117> and years; <WH8141>
and let them be for lights <WH3974> in the expanse <WH7549> of sky <WH8064> to give light <WH215> on the earth; <WH776>" and it was so.

God <WH430> made <WH6213> the two <WH8147> great <WH1419> lights: <WH3974> the greater <WH1419> light <WH3974> to rule <WH4475> the day, <WH3117> and the lesser <WH6996> light <WH3974> to rule <WH4475> the night. <WH3915> He also made the stars. <WH3556>
God <WH430> set <WH5414> them in the expanse <WH7549> of sky <WH8064> to give light <WH215> to the earth, <WH776>
and to rule <WH4910> over the day <WH3117> and over the night, <WH3915> and to divide <WH914> the light <WH216> from the darkness. <WH2822> God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good. <WH2896>
There was evening <WH6153> and there was morning, <WH1242> a fourth <WH7243> day. <WH3117>

God <WH430> said, <WH559> "Let the waters <WH4325> swarm <WH5315> with swarms <WH8317> of living <WH2416> creatures, <WH8318> and let birds <WH5775> fly <WH5774> above <WH5921> the earth <WH776> in the open <WH6440> expanse <WH7549> of sky. <WH8064>"

God <WH430> created <WH1254> the large <WH1419> sea creatures, <WH8577> and every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that moves, <WH7430> with which the waters <WH4325> swarmed, <WH8317> after their kind, <WH4327> and every winged <WH3671> bird <WH5775> after its kind. <WH4327> God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good. <WH2896>

God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> them, <WH559> saying, "Be fruitful, <WH6509> and multiply, <WH7235> and fill <WH4390> the waters <WH4325> in the seas, <WH3220> and let birds <WH5775> multiply <WH7235> on the earth. <WH776>"
There was evening <WH6153> and there was morning, <WH1242> a fifth <WH2549> day. <WH3117>

God <WH430> said, <WH559> "Let the earth <WH776> produce <WH3318> living <WH2416> creatures <WH5315> after their kind, <WH4327> livestock, <WH929> creeping things, <WH7431> and animals <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> after their kind; <WH4327>" and it was so.

God <WH430> made <WH6213> the animals <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> after their kind, <WH4327> and the livestock <WH929> after their kind, <WH4327> and everything that creeps <WH7431> on the ground <WH127> after its kind. <WH4327> God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good. <WH2896>

God <WH430> said, <WH559> "Let us make <WH6213> man <WH120> in our image, <WH6754> after our likeness: <WH1823> and let them have dominion <WH7287> over the fish <WH1710> of the sea, <WH3220> and over the birds <WH5775> of the sky, <WH8064> and over the livestock, <WH929> and over all the earth, <WH776> and over every creeping thing <WH7431> that creeps <WH7430> on the earth. <WH776>"
God <WH430> created <WH1254> man <WH120> in his own image. <WH6754> In God <WH430>'s image <WH6754> he created <WH1254> him; <WH2145> male and female <WH5347> he created them. <WH1254>

God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> them. <WH430> God said <WH559> to them, <WH6509> "Be fruitful, multiply, <WH7235> fill <WH4390> the earth, <WH776> and subdue it. <WH3533> Have dominion <WH7287> over the fish <WH1710> of the sea, <WH3220> over the birds <WH5775> of the sky, <WH8064> and over every living thing <WH2416> that moves <WH7430> on the earth. <WH776>"

God <WH430> said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH2009> I have given <WH5414> you every herb <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> seed, <WH2233> which is on the surface <WH6440> of all the earth, <WH776> and every tree, <WH6086> which bears fruit <WH6529> yielding <WH2232> seed. <WH2233> It will be <WH1961> your food. <WH402>

To every animal <WH2416> of the earth, <WH776> and to every bird <WH5775> of the sky, <WH8064> and to everything that creeps <WH7430> on the earth, <WH776> in which there is life, <WH2416> I have given every green <WH3418> herb <WH6212> for food; <WH402>" and it was so.

God <WH430> saw <WH7200> everything that <WH834> he had made, <WH6213> and, <WH3966> behold, it was very good. <WH2896> There was evening <WH6153> and there was morning, <WH1242> a sixth <WH8345> day. <WH3117>
